title: XCOM.2.Crack.Only-sam2k8
description:
Install instructions:
- Copy contents of torrent to your main game directory
- Navigate to XCOM 2BinariesWin64
- First run the CPUID.Patch.bat to create the executable
- Create a shortcut from XCom2.exe and add -noRedScreens -review to the target of shortcut
- Run the game from the shortcut
- If CPUID patch freezes, go to windows region and language setting, then 
administrative tab and set the system locale to English (US) and restart your PC.
Credits: thank you to sam2k for making. You are the man
